attributes.title: WOW HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: App didn’t download at all and when it did it crashed 50% of the time and when I got the chance to put my credentials it would just crash! Horrible app

attributes.title: Donald Trump stole my cat
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and wanted to donate to his cause🤩🤩however when donating I accidentally clicked the “cat” option and now he won’t give me a refund😡😡never donating again I miss u mittens fly high✨💖🧚‍♀️🙏🕊

attributes.title: BAD APP
attributes.review: Horrible app!!!! Do not download, it’s slow, it glitches, just a terrible app. My phone now has a bunch of viruses i was going to vote for him but this horrible experience changed my mind. Bad bad bad bad app

attributes.title: F* no bAbY
attributes.review: That 🎃 can go to hell. Anyway the app is very slow just like our Cheeto of a president. Do not download not educational. Advice for 🟠 wear a rope as a necklace climb a tree and then hook the back of the necklace on the tree and dangle from it🧚 You will feel like your flying 😘ur welcome 🍊

attributes.title: IT IS TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: now i believe in voodoo stuff so yall should too. right when i downloaded this app, my pet ant died. later, i saw a snake in my backyard, and it KILLED ME. yall i am in my GRAVE. i just decided to write this review from the afterlife bc its that bad of an app😔😡👁👅👁

attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: This app is the WORST. I was trying to get to know more info on the best president ever and the app kept on quitting. I tried turning my phone on and off and it still didn’t work. This app is a MESS.

attributes.title: So bad 💔
attributes.review: This app is so bad it gave my phone a virus and I just wanted to support the big orange guy 😔💔 when I tried to open it it said “no” I’m just hurt because I have to buy another phone 🥺

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It was just horrible for many reasons. If I could give it zero stars I would it have my phone cockroaches and I hate insects. This app is taking away my rights.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded it took 3 hours!! I really support thanos man and it would be terrrible if people found out that apple would take down this app if it got bad reviews 😢 😨

attributes.title: this app scared my cheese plant 😡😪
attributes.review: I bought this app so that I could go to a trump rally. Sadly my mother told me I had to walk our cheese plant on the rally day 😔. I said to my cheese plant that I had to go to a rally, and the plant got so scared she killed herself 😭. Rest in peace, cheese plant!!!!!
